location.physicalLocation: British Library: India Office Records and Private Papers

titleInfo.title: Draft of a Letter from Ephraim Gerrish Stannus, Resident at Bushire, to Mirza Ally Akbar, the Agent at Shiraz

physicalDescription.extent: Foliation: This item has two different foliation sequences. The first is part of an original foliation sequence which was applied to the whole volume. It is written in ink and appears at the top right (recto) or top left (verso) corner of the folio. The second foliation number is a small pencil number enclosed in a circle which also appears in the top right corner (recto) only, this is the foliation number that has been used in referencing this item.Condition: The item has suffered from slight insect damage, but this does not affect the reading of the text.

mods.abstract: The letter mentions letters to be distributed to the Prince of Shiraz and Zakee Khan. It praises Mirza Ally Akbar's communications on affairs in Persia, and discusses payment for an import of horses for use by the British Government.
